title: And spare the child
creator_credit: Film Australia, Malcolm Otton and Antonio Colacino
brief_description: Raises the problem of when and how to discipline children. Every culture has certain standards or values, and children absorb attitudes and values from the family. Discusses the role that discipline has to play in this process and how this discipline should change as the child grows and develops.
